topics.description: Topics to subscribe to and publish over the Azure Edge Runtime, each key is an EII Message bus topic

additionalProperties.description: Each additional property's key must be the EMB topic string

eii_config.description: EII ETCD configuration object, see EII documentation

az_output_topic.definition: Output stream name in Azure Edge Runtime

az_blob_container_name.definition: Azure Blob Storage container name for all images (note: not an actual container, see Azure Blob Storage documentation)

emb_socket_file.description: Object for specifiying a specific socket file for IPC communication

socket_file.definition: File in the socket directory to use
